name: Name
have_account: Already have an account? Sign in
support: Support the operation of Lectio divina
support_full: ❤️ Support the operation of Lectio divina
login_required_to_comment: Please sign in to add a comment.
logout_confirm: Are you sure you want to sign out?
password_length: Password must be at least 6 characters.
confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete?
register_failed_try_other: Registration failed. Try another email or a stronger password.
user_exists: A user with this email already exists.
email_not_confirmed: Email address has not been confirmed. Please check your email and confirm registration.
slider_subtitle_god_word: in the form of Lectio divina
slider_subtitle_meditatio: Invitation to meditate on the Word ...
slider_subtitle_contemplatio: The inner gaze of the heart at Jesus ...
module_not_available: The module "{0}" is not available yet.
reset_email_sent: If there is an account with this email, a reset email has been sent.
delete_note_confirm: Do you really want to delete this note?
delete_account_desc: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
account_deleted_desc: Your account has been successfully deleted.
lectio_not_available: Lectio for this day is not available.
l_commenter: Listen to this text by reading slowly and aloud, and repeat it three times.
l_meditatio: Meditate on which word, words, phrases, or even whole sentences touch you or speak to you from the text, and then write them down.
l_oratio: Respond with prayer to the words, phrases, or sentences that God has placed in your heart.
l_conteplatio: Rest in God's presence and let Him root the words He revealed to you within you.
l_actio: Today, repeat and live out this word often:
reset_password_email_sent: Password reset email has been sent.
reset_password_instructions: Enter your email and we will send you instructions to reset your password.
bible_en_desc: The English version uses only one Bible text.
audio_bible_select_desc: Choose which Bible text you want to listen to.
audio_bible_select_hint_desc: Select the Bible text you want to hear in audio format.
audio_bible_select_error_desc: Failed to load the selected Bible text. Please try again.
audio_bible_select_no_text_desc: There are currently no Bible texts available for audio playback.
audio_nothing_playing: Nothing is playing at the moment.
